attributes.action: Change the current time zone to be inline with Europe as we are part of it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people like me hate the dark afternoons at 4pm in winter, I propose we change this to be inline with europe.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/betteruseofsun/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
